sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndammapteam ( ORGNZT_ID , orgnzt_nm , cl_de , knwldg_url , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm ) VALUES ( #orgnztId# , #orgnztNm# , #clDe# , #knwldgUrl# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndammapteam SET orgnzt_id = #orgnztId# , orgnzt_nm = #orgnztNm# , cl_de = #clDe# , knwldg_url = #knwldgUrl# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# WHERE orgnzt_id = #orgnztId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT orgnzt_id , orgnzt_nm , cl_de , knwldg_url , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtndammapteam WHERE orgnzt_id = #orgnztId#

SELECT orgnzt_id , orgnzt_nm , cl_de , knwldg_url , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtndammapteam WHERE 1=1
orgnzt_id = #searchKeyword#
orgnzt_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY orgnzt_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
